description:
NCTC：Step by Step To Learn Chinese Season 01（A total of 24 or 25 classes）Total Immersion Chinese Language Teaching

This course is designed for: Those who is interested in learning Chinese but has little or no proficiency in Chinese.

In this course you will learn: ① to recognize the most essential 134 New Words and 345 Word-groups ② to read and even write at an primary level ③ useful insights into China and its culture ④ the basics of this language, so that you have something really solid to build on further

This course include: ① Teaching video ② Supporting textbooks ③ workbook ④ NCTC New Horizon：Chinese Culture

This PDF require Adobe Reader XI.

At the end of each month, update the 3 - 4 classes.
title: NCTC：Step by Step To Learn Chinese Season 01
